content: Is there a stream under which it would make sense to have a topic that's just me writing out whatever thoughts I have? I think it could be fun and useful for me to do that, without having to decide that my thoughts/questions are important enough to warrant their own topic somewhere, and anyone else could engage with them if they wanted, or mute the topic if they wanted less noise
(This is a patterns I've seen and used on facebook and discord)

We don't really encourage that kind of things, although some users clearly did it without asking for permission in the past. This place is rather more formal and structured than a typical Discord server.
@Alex Altair if you want to write some thoughts that will only be accessible to you, then you could always send yourself some private messages.
I've seen channels like this on Discord servers, basically just one user posting their thoughts and occasionally others chime in

But we try to run this server as a professional research forum and try to keep the quality of the content as high as possible in general (e.g. anything off-topic is strongly discouraged, memes discouraged etc)
